title: Happy Trip - Isla del Sol -
description: This game is completely in Japanese. Educational game which can be enjoyed from 3 years old. Happy in the world !! ～Let's save the world by "piece of sound" !～ Please enjoy the new family experience "Electronic picture book + Game" is spun out. [Charity] You can that participate in charity while playing in the game. 　Please refer here for more details. http://www.happy-trip.jp/whats.html#charity [Community] 　Site : http://www.happy-trip.jp 　YouTube : http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=46TnqOthjGs 　facebook : http://on.fb.me/173PSwn 　Twitter : http://twitter.com/happytrip_news [Planning, Production and Sale] 　Aquariumy Studio Inc. 　http://www.aquariumy.co.jp 　 　Established a studio in April 2008 from the thought 　"life as was born from the sea, you want to create the content impressive from the studio". 　That it creates the content impressive in the future, we will continue to strive.
overview: Released in August 2013 by Aquariumy Studio Inc..
